attributes.action: Pause / Cancel council tax for the duration of COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: Pause/cancel the cancel tax until those who have be financial impacted by Covid-19 are back on there feet and back into work!
attributes.background: Many people will be in financial difficulty due to COVID-19. Whether self isolating OR losing their job due to closures set by the government thus, people will not be able to make payment which ultimately can cause court proceedings! The government should help by pausing/cancelling council tax.
